name: Vumpires: Night of the Bat-men
description:
In Vumpires: Night of the Bat-men you are the sole survivor of an ancient curse who has to clear your town of a vumpire (umpire vampire) infestation.

A metaphor.

Controls
  • Left/Right or A/D:  move
  • Z: Swing Bat
  • X: Jump
  • C: Throw Baseball

Gamepads might also work, too? Try waggling those buttons around and see what happens?

The theme gave us the idea for "Vampires" but, other than that, we didn't _really_ utilize the theme. Oops.

Credits
  • Tim Hely: Coding, Title and Intro artwork
  • Naomi Hely: Level, enemy, and player artwork, music, sound effects
Tools Used
  • HaxeFlixel
  • Adobe Photoshop
  • BeepBox
  • Bfxr
